duties_responsibilities.duty: Model the 3 Company values of Compassion, Integrity, and Excellence, and promote the Compassus philosophy, using the 6 Pillars of success as the foundation.
Coordinate and manage the hospice office to run efficiently, and work with different departments to coordinate billing, human resources, and administrative duties.
Apply the rules and regulations of state and federal regulatory agencies and other certified agencies.
Maintain records and ensure accuracy of billing for pharmacy and medical supplies.
Serve as communications liaison between colleagues and candidates and the Human Resources and Payroll staff.
Monitor and maintain master calendar of program-specific activities required by regulatory agencies.
Manage the general maintenance of the facility with contractors.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED required. Associate's or Bachelor's degree preferred.
Experience in insurance and Medicare/Medicaid billing and reimbursement preferred.
